name: domain-locker
description: Domain Locker is a self-hosted dashboard and monitoring tool for domain names. It tracks expiry dates, DNS configuration, SSL status, and registrar details, helping operators avoid lapses and keep domain information organized.

features.title: Ssl Certificate Status
features.description: Track certificate expiration and validity for domains to maintain secure connections

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Manage portfolios of domains with sortable lists and filtering by status or expiration date

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Receive email or webhook alerts when domains approach expiration or configuration changes occur

features.title: Data Privacy
features.description: Keep sensitive domain information on your own server without sharing with third-party services
